extDescription.message: Shortcuts for tab and window actions for Windows and Linux.

incognito_label.message: Open a new window in Incognito mode

newTab_label.message: Open a new tab, and jump to it

reopen_label.message: Reopen previously closed tabs in the order they were closed

next_label.message: Jump to the next open tab

previsous_label.message: Jump to the previous open tab

home_label.message: Open your home page in the current tab

previousHistory_label.message: Open the previous page from your browsing history in the current tab

nextHistory_label.message: Open the next page from your browsing history in the current tab
